languages.text: "Губернатор привлекает слишком много ненужного внимания, а я хотел развязать себе руки. Предложил своему скомороху честный обмен: он становится мной, правит, жирует и ни в чем себе не отказывает. Пока я лечу навстречу звездам. Мы обменялись лицами, одеждой и жизнями. После того, как я приучил местную знать пришивать себе чужие морды, все прошло незаметно".

traits.locale_text: "Губернатор привлекает слишком много ненужного внимания, а я хотел развязать себе руки. Чтобы плести ими паутину интриг, для чего же еще? И предложил своему скомороху честный обмен. Он становится мной, правит, жирует и ни в чем себе не отказывает. Пока я лечу навстречу звездам".

languages.text: "A governor attracts too much attention, and I wanted my hands to stay untied. So, I offered my court fool a fair bargain: he would become me — ruling the planet, living the good life, getting whatever he wanted — while I would be out there, flying toward the stars. We traded faces, clothes, and lives. And because I had gotten the local nobles into the habit of sewing other people's mugs on their heads, the switch went unnoticed."
languages.original_text: "Губернатор привлекает слишком много ненужного внимания, а я хотел развязать себе руки. Предложил своему скомороху честный обмен: он становится мной, правит, жирует и ни в чем себе не отказывает. Пока я лечу навстречу звездам. Мы обменялись лицами, одеждой и жизнями. После того, как я приучил местную знать пришивать себе чужие морды, все прошло незаметно".

traits.locale_text: "A governor attracts too much unwanted attention, and I wanted my hands untied. So I offered my court fool a fair bargain: he'd become me, ruling the place, living the good life, getting whatever he wanted. While I'd be out there flying toward the stars. We traded faces, clothes, and lives. And because I had got the local nobles into the habit of sewing other people's mugs on, the swap went unnoticed."

languages.text: “总督的身份实在是太引人瞩目了，我不想引起不必要的注意。于是，我和我的小丑达成了公平交易：他负责坐在我的位置上，统治这颗行星，过上理想的生活，得到他想得到的一切，而我会离开这里，飞向群星。我们交换了面孔、衣服，互换了人生。在我的培养之下，当地贵族养成了将别人的脸缝在自己脸上的习俗，因此，这场交换也没有引起任何人注意。”
languages.original_text: "A governor attracts too much attention, and I wanted my hands to stay untied. So, I offered my court fool a fair bargain: he would become me — ruling the planet, living the good life, getting whatever he wanted — while I would be out there, flying toward the stars. We traded faces, clothes, and lives. And because I had gotten the local nobles into the habit of sewing other people's mugs on their heads, the switch went unnoticed."

traits.locale_text: “总督的身份实在是太引人瞩目了，我不想引起不必要的注意。于是，我和我的小丑达成了公平交易：他负责坐在我的位置上，统治这颗行星，过上理想的生活，得到他想得到的一切，而我会离开这里，飞向群星。我们交换了面孔、衣服，互换了人生。在我的培养之下，当地贵族养成了将别人的脸缝在自己脸上的习俗，因此，这场交换也没有引起任何人注意。”
“总督的身份实在是太引人瞩目了，我不想引起不必要的注意。于是，我和我的小丑达成了公平交易：他负责坐在我的位置上，统治这颗行星，过着美好的生活，得到他想得到的一切，而我则会离开这里，飞向群星。我们交换了面孔、衣服，互换了人生。在我的培养之下，当地贵族养成了将别人的脸缝在自己脸上的习俗，因此，这场交换也没有引起任何人注意。”

languages.text: 「総督はとても注目を引きつける。それに、私は私の手を結んだままにしておきたかった。だから、私は私の宮廷道化師に公平な取引を提示した。彼が私になり―惑星を支配し、良い生活を送り、彼が欲しいものをなんでも手に入れ―その間、私は外に出て、星に向かって飛ぶという取引を。私たちは顔、服装、生活を交換した。そして、私は地元の貴族に他の人の顔を頭に縫い付けるという習慣をつけさせたので、この交換は気づかれなかった」
languages.original_text: "A governor attracts too much attention, and I wanted my hands to stay untied. So, I offered my court fool a fair bargain: he would become me — ruling the planet, living the good life, getting whatever he wanted — while I would be out there, flying toward the stars. We traded faces, clothes, and lives. And because I had gotten the local nobles into the habit of sewing other people's mugs on their heads, the swap went unnoticed."

traits.locale_text: 「総督はとても注目を引きつける。それに、私は私の手を結んだままにしておきたかった。だから、私は私の宮廷道化師に公平な取引を提示した。彼が私になり―惑星を支配し、良い生活を送り、彼が欲しいものをなんでも手に入れ―その間、私は外に出て、星に向かって飛ぶという取引を。私たちは顔、服装、生活を交換した。そして、私は地元の貴族に他の人の顔を頭に縫い付けるという習慣をつけさせたので、この交換は気づかれなかった」

languages.text: «Un gobernador atrae demasiada atención, y yo quería tener las manos libres. Así que le ofrecí un trato justo al bufón de mi corte: él se haría pasar por mí, controlaría el planeta, se daría la buena vida y conseguiría todo lo que quisiera, mientras yo estaba ahí fuera surcando las estrellas. Nos intercambiamos el aspecto, la ropa y la vida. Y como ya tenía a los nobles locales acostumbrados a coserse caras ajenas encima de las suyas, el cambio pasó totalmente desapercibido».
languages.original_text: "A governor attracts too much attention, and I wanted my hands to stay untied. So, I offered my court fool a fair bargain: he would become me — ruling the planet, living the good life, getting whatever he wanted — while I would be out there, flying toward the stars. We traded faces, clothes, and lives. And because I had gotten the local nobles into the habit of sewing other people's mugs on their heads, the switch went unnoticed."

Así que le ofrecí un trato justo al bufón de mi corte: él se haría pasar por mí, controlaría el planeta, se daría la buena vida y conseguiría todo lo que quisiera, mientras yo estaba ahí fuera surcando las estrellas. Nos intercambiamos el aspecto, la ropa y la vida. Y como ya tenía a los nobles locales acostumbrados a coserse caras ajenas encima de las suyas, el intercambio pasó totalmente desapercibido».

languages.text: "Vali dediğin çok fazla dikkat çeker, ben de ellerimin bağlı kalmasını istemedim. Bu yüzden saray soytarıma iyi bir teklifte bulundum... Gezegeni yöneten, iyi bir hayat süren, istediği her şeyi elde eden kişiyi oynayacaktı, bense yıldızlara doğru uçuyor olacaktım. Yüzlerimizi, kıyafetlerimizi ve hayatlarımızı takas ettik. Gezegen soylularını başkalarının suratlarını kafalarına dikme alışkanlığına soktuğum için değiş tokuşu fark eden olmadı."
languages.original_text: "A governor attracts too much attention, and I wanted my hands to stay untied. So, I offered my court fool a fair bargain: he would become me — ruling the planet, living the good life, getting whatever he wanted — while I would be out there, flying toward the stars. We traded faces, clothes, and lives. And because I had gotten the local nobles into the habit of sewing other people's mugs on their heads, the switch went unnoticed."

Gezegen soylularını başkalarının suratlarını kafalarına dikme alışkanlığına soktuğum için takası fark eden olmadı."

languages.text: « Un gouverneur attire trop l'attention et je voulais garder les mains libres. J'ai donc fait une proposition honnête à mon bouffon : celle de prendre ma place, de régner sur la planète, de mener grand train et d'obtenir tout ce qu'il désire, pendant que je m'envolerais vers les étoiles. Nous avons donc échangé nos visages, nos vêtements et nos vies. Et grâce à l'habitude que j'ai instaurée chez les nobles locaux de se coudre la trogne de quelqu'un d'autre sur la tête, l'échange est passé inaperçu. »
languages.original_text: "A governor attracts too much attention, and I wanted my hands to stay untied. So, I offered my court fool a fair bargain: he would become me — ruling the planet, living the good life, getting whatever he wanted — while I would be out there, flying toward the stars. We traded faces, clothes, and lives. And because I had gotten the local nobles into the habit of sewing other people's mugs on their heads, the switch went unnoticed."

J'ai donc fait une proposition honnête à mon bouffon : celle de prendre ma place, de régner sur la planète, de mener grand train et d'obtenir tout ce qu'il désire, pendant que je m'envolerais vers les étoiles. Et grâce à l'habitude que j'ai instaurée chez les nobles locaux de se coudre la trogne de quelqu'un d'autre sur la tête, l'échange est passé inaperçu. »

languages.text: "Ein Gouverneur erzeugt zu viel Aufmerksamkeit, und ich wollte die Hände frei haben. Also bot ich meinem Hofnarren ein faires Geschäft an: Er würde ich werden – den Planeten beherrschen, ein gutes Leben führen, alles kriegen, was er wollte –, während ich draußen wäre und zu den Sternen flöge. Wir haben Gesicht, Kleidung und Leben getauscht. Und weil ich die ansässigen Adeligen dazu gebracht hatte, sich die Gesichter anderer Leute auf die Köpfe zu nähen, hat niemand etwas bemerkt."
languages.original_text: "A governor attracts too much attention, and I wanted my hands to stay untied. So, I offered my court fool a fair bargain: he would become me — ruling the planet, living the good life, getting whatever he wanted — while I would be out there, flying toward the stars. We traded faces, clothes, and lives. And because I had gotten the local nobles into the habit of sewing other people's mugs on their heads, the switch went unnoticed."
